title: Smoked trout with beetroot remoulade and Guinness bread recipe
text:
This is also fabulous made with smoked eel. Try it if you’re serving adults – children might not be keen – and want to push the boat out. You’ll find fresh horseradish at some greengrocers, or use grated stuff in a jar, such as English Provender Company’s.

The sweet-bitter Guinness bread is great with these smoked flavours, but you could also try wholemeal soda bread.

Prep time: 25 minutes | Cooking time: 50 minutes

SERVES

Eight

INGREDIENTS

For the bread

250g wholemeal flour

85g plain flour

35g medium oatmeal

1¼ tsp bicarbonate of soda

25g butter, cut into small cubes

2 tbsp soft dark brown sugar

85ml Guinness

40ml treacle

200ml buttermilk jumbo oats, to sprinkle

For the remoulade...
description: This is also fabulous made with smoked eel.
